text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
It's been a while since I've had a<n>day off, so I decide to go
shopping for<n>some essentials. I bump into a<n>familiar face
at the mall.

text_block_list.name: Girl A
text_block_list.text: Sob, sob...

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text:
There, there. I'm sure it was scary,<n>right? But everything's
gonna be<n>okay now.

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: Just wait here for a second, okay?<n>I'll... umm...

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text:
Trainer! Perfect timing—it seems like<n>this little girl here got
lost.

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text:
I found her crying in the corner by<n>herself and tried to ask
her what's<n>wrong...

text_block_list.name: Girl A
text_block_list.text: Sob, sob...

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: Aw, was it scary being alone? There,<n>there. It's okay now.

text_block_list.name: Girl A
text_block_list.text: Umm... I... don't know... waaaah!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Crap, I shouldn't have asked that<n>question! She's bawling
now.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I quickly take out my handkerchief<n>from my pocket and
wipe the girl's<n>face.

text_block_list.name: Girl A
text_block_list.text: Sob, sob...

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: Aww, Trainer! Thank you so much.

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text:
Your face is all cleaned up now. Isn't<n>that nice? So tell me...
were you out<n>here shopping?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: The little girl gives a small nod.

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: I see! What did you want to buy?

text_block_list.name: Girl A
text_block_list.text:
I wanted... an Umagical Wand...<n>because Papa and Mama
said...<n>they'd buy it for me...

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text:
Well, isn't that nice? You must've<n>been excited! Does that
mean you<n>came here together with your Papa<n>and Mama?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The little girl nods again. There's no<n>doubt that she's lost. I
pause, thinking<n>about the best thing to do in this<n>situation...
choice_data_list:
I'll go to the information desk and let the staff
know!

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: Yes, please do. I'll stay here with her.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
As I approach the desk, I see a<n>husband and wife standing
there,<n>faces stricken with worry. They must<n>be the girl's
parents!

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text:
Trainer, thank you so much for your<n>help today. I'm so glad
that little girl<n>was able to reunite with her parents.
choice_data_list: I didn't really do anything though...
I didn't really do anything though...

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: No, really. Be proud of yourself—you<n>were such a big help.

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text:
Until you showed up, I wasn't sure<n>what I was going to do. I
couldn't just<n>walk away with the girl, so I thought<n>about
calling for help...

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text:
But there weren't any staff nearby<n>either. Honestly, I felt
stuck.

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text:
So when you came, it was a huge<n>relief. I was really happy
to see you.
choice_data_list: But I made the poor girl cry...

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text:
Hehe, maybe it wouldn't hurt to learn<n>a bit more about how
to handle little<n>kids.

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: But really though... I felt safe with you<n>being there.

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text:
I appreciated having you with me, so<n>please don't put
yourself down.
choice_data_list:
I suppose I've become a little more reliable
then.

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: Of course!

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text:
And you didn't forget your<n>handkerchief this time. Good
job! ♪

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: Hehe, I can't help myself though. ♪

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Even though our dynamics haven't<n>changed much, I feel
that I was able to<n>gain more of Super Creek's trust<n>today.

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: (I'm glad I can depend on you,<n>Trainer.)
